concept.title: 53.216-1 Delivery orders and orders under basic ordering agreements (OF 347).

conbody.p: , Order for Supplies or Services. , prescribed in (f) (or an approved agency form), may be used to place orders under indefinite delivery contracts and basic ordering agreements, as specified in (d)(2)(i).
